p: DNA was extracted from tail and mice were genotyped by electrophoresis of the generated compounds submitted to polymerase chain reaction (PCR). The DNA extraction and the PCR were performed using the REDExtract-N-Amp TM Tissue PCR Kit (Sigma®, St. Louis, Missouri, EUA). Mice that presented a band around 200 bp correspond to the wild type pattern (C57BL/6), while a band around 400 bp corresponds to the IL-10 −/− (KO) genotype (Supplemental Fig. 4).
